body.name: Solo Stove Yukon 2.0, Smokeless Fire Pit | Portable Wood Burning Fireplace with Removable Ash Pan, Large Outdoor Firepit - Stainless Steel, H: 17 in x Dia: 27 in, 38 lbs
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins.
features: LARGEST SOLO STOVE: Coming in at 27 inches, the Yukon out measures all other Solo Stove fire pits, creating the hottest and most effective fire to make time with your friends and family richer. Enjoy S'mores and Hot Dogs by the fire and relax. The new 2.0 version features a removable base plate and ash pan for easy cleaning.

LESS SMOKE, MORE FLAME: The camping stove features our Signature 360° Airflow and double wall design with bottom vent holes for oxygen to feed the fire from below, creating a burst of hot air over the fire and reducing the smoke without the use of batteries and fans in your fireplaces. Enjoy a fire without the post-fire smell in your hair and clothes.

LONG LASTING: 304 stainless steel is highly durable, surprisingly lightweight, and won’t cave under the pressure of an ultra-hot flame. Count on your fire pit to hold up to all of your experiences– whether in the backyard, at your team’s tailgate, or in the backcountry.

REMOVABLE ASH PAN: Now it's even easier to clean up your fire pit after enjoying the fire with friends and family. Our new, removable ash pan rests under the base plate, catching all the fine ash in one place. For clean up just lift the base plate to remove the ash pan, clean out its contents, and that's it!

EASY TO USE: Making good moments should always be easy. This outdoor patio heater construction completely removes the need for parts and assembly! Bring it from your backyard patio to camping, or tailgating! 17x27 inch size wood burning fire pit, fire pits for outside.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Biggest Fire Pit Created for Community Solo Stove Yukon 2.0 Yukon is the fire pit created for community. Easily light up a smokeless fire anywhere life takes you, and make memories for years to come with the fire pit built to last. We have used our same patented technology that has been perfected into the largest fire pit yet. The double wall design creates a burst of hot air over the fire reducing the smoke. By design, Yukon burns wood so efficiently you’ll only be left with ultra-fine ash. With our 2.0 design cleaning becomes even easier than before.

360° Signature Airflow Design How does it work? Cool air comes in the bottom vents to feed the fire and enters between the two layers of stainless steel to be heated up. Having cool air come in the bottom vents allows the fire to always plenty of oxygen. Since more oxygen can reach the fuel source, fire wood is burned more efficiently than traditional fire pits. The air that enters the double wall warms up and is pushed out over the fire. This creates a second burn that burns off the small particles of wood that would have been smoke.

Previous page Enjoy with Friends Use the Yukon for food or as the perfect ambiance for your party and unforgettable experiences Easy Set Up Ditch the hassle of complicated assembly. Just flip the ring and start your fire! The Biggest Flame With a flame up to 4 feet Yukon surely will not disappoint your festive and outdoor gatherings. Long Lasting 304 stainless steel is highly durable, lightweight, and won’t cave under the pressure of a hot flame Removable Ash Pan Just lift the base plate to remove the ash pan, clean out its contents for super easy cleaning. Next page 1 Enjoy with Friends 2 Easy Set Up 3 The Biggest Flame 4 Long Lasting 5 Removable Ash Pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Smoke. Burns very clean!
reviews.reviewText: Works better than expected. Once warm thermal temperature differences makes forced air blow air to complete combustion. $$$ awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Very safe. Burns very clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The firepit itself is nice but it was a huge disappointment to receive it damaged for the amount of money I spent on it. It was dented in two places on the front. I ordered it for short term rental guests and it came late so it arrived the night before the guests arrived. I could not return it because the guest wanted to use it. I should have returned it and bought it at a local store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wife loved this thing. She wanted fire pit and did not specify so I went big! We made a fire and was impressed how the smoke was contained

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My kids got me the Yukon for Christmas and I do love it, of course now they come out with the 2.0 the way it should have been designed from the start. Why would you not make the ash pan accessible?Also the stove was designed to incorporate all of these ridiculously overpriced add-ons , namely the lid and heat diverter, which is necessary because all the heat goes straight up.Never would have purchased it for myself but I’m glad the kids did, it does work great otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Product that Works as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: I like the 2.0 stove because it is large enough to accommodate standard fire log lengths. Access to the spacious interior makes lighting a breeze. After the embers are formed and the main logs start to burn, the stove produces very little visible smoke or burning ashes escaping into the atmosphere. The stove produces an amazing amount of heat that radiates in every direction. Clean-up is easy and the weight of the stove allows for effortless transport to other locations. I recommend buying a cover if the stove is kept outside since it will fill with water if left in the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it, we use to have a ground fire pit, got tired of smelling like smoke so I bought this. Works amazingly, we use it all the time. Very well made product. You get what you pay for, you’ll be happy.
